thread.title: To Manage Storms, Airlines Try to Keep Passengers Away From Airports

author: Doug Cameron
title: To Manage Storms, Airlines Try to Keep Passengers Away From Airports
text:
Airlines have a new strategy for managing winter storms: keep more passengers away from snowbound airports.
Four norâ€™easters have ravaged the most congested part of the U.S. airspace in recent weeks, triggering thousands of flight cancellations. Big airline hubs in Atlanta and Chicago have also faced severe disruption from winter weather.

Carriers...
